short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DevSprout Udemy Affiliate Add-on, plus fix for Udemy Q&A link bug.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is an easy way for you to support DevSprout.io by allowing the extension to append our affiliate id to the url of any Udemy course page that you visit while browsing with chrome.
By using this extension you acknowledge that any course you purchase from Udemy.com will result in me (Ian Schoonover) making a commission due to the affiliate query string added to the url. 
Any course you purchase will have a 30-day money back guarantee from Udemy.

The extension also fixes the Udemy Q&A link bug.

Thank you!
